snippet: The Mets declined a $25 million option on the injured pitcher Johan Santana and will pay him a $5.5 million buyout.
abstract: New York Mets decline $25 million option on the injured pitcher Johan Santana and will pay him a $5.5 million buyout.
lead_paragraph: The Mets declined a $25 million option on the injured pitcher Johan Santana and will pay him a $5.5 million buyout.

headline.main: Mets Opt to Buy Out Santana
headline.print_headline: Mets Opt to Buy Out Santana
